verses.verse: In you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> do I put my trust: <S%H2620><s%> let me never <S%H408><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be put to confusion. <S%H954><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me in your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and cause me to escape: <S%H6403><s%> incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to me, and save <S%H3467><s%> me.

Be you my strong <S%H6697><s%> habitation, <S%H4583><s%> whereunto I may continually <S%H8548><s%> resort: <S%H935><s%> you have given commandment <S%H6680><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me; for you are my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress. <S%H4686><s%>
Deliver <S%H6403><s%> me, O my God, <S%H430><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the unrighteous <S%H5765><s%> and cruel <S%H2556><s%> man.
For you are my hope, <S%H8615><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> you are my trust <S%H4009><s%> from my youth. <S%H5271><s%>

By you have I been held <S%H5564><s%> up from the womb: <S%H990><s%> you are he that took <S%H1491><s%> me out of my mother's <S%H517><s%> bowels: <S%H4578><s%> my praise <S%H8416><s%> shall be continually <S%H8548><s%> of you.
I am as a wonder <S%H4159><s%> to many; <S%H7227><s%> but you are my strong <S%H5797><s%> refuge. <S%H4268><s%>
Let my mouth <S%H6310><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with your praise <S%H8416><s%> and with your honor <S%H8597><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day. <S%H3117><s%>
Cast <S%H7993><s%> me not off in the time <S%H6256><s%> of old <S%H2209><s%> age; forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not when my strength <S%H3581><s%> fails. <S%H3615><s%>
For my enemies <S%H341><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> against me; and they that lay wait <S%H8104><s%> for my soul <S%H5315><s%> take counsel <S%H3289><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%>
Saying, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> him: persecute <S%H7291><s%> and take <S%H8610><s%> him; for there is none <S%H369><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> him.
O God, <S%H430><s%> be not far <S%H7368><s%> from me: O my God, <S%H430><s%> make haste <S%H2439><s%> for my help. <S%H5833><s%>

Let them be confounded <S%H954><s%> and consumed <S%H3615><s%> that are adversaries <S%H7853><s%> to my soul; <S%H5315><s%> let them be covered <S%H5844><s%> with reproach <S%H2781><s%> and dishonor <S%H3639><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> my hurt. <S%H7451><s%>
But I will hope <S%H3176><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> and will yet praise <S%H8416><s%> you more <S%H3254><s%> and more. <S%H3254><s%>

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall show <S%H5608><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and your salvation <S%H8668><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day; <S%H3117><s%> for I know <S%H3045><s%> not the numbers <S%H5615><s%> thereof.
I will go <S%H935><s%> in the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> even of your only. <S%H905><s%>
O God, <S%H430><s%> you have taught <S%H3925><s%> me from my youth: <S%H5271><s%> and till now <S%H5704><s%> <S%H2008><s%> have I declared <S%H5046><s%> your wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works.

Now also <S%H1571><s%> when <S%H5704><s%> I am old <S%H2209><s%> and gray headed, <S%H7872><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not; until <S%H5704><s%> I have showed <S%H5046><s%> your strength <S%H2220><s%> to this generation, <S%H1755><s%> and your power <S%H1369><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> one that is to come. <S%H935><s%>

Your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> also, O God, <S%H430><s%> is very <S%H5704><s%> high, <S%H4791><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> things: O God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> to you!

You, which <S%H834><s%> have showed <S%H7200><s%> me great <S%H7229><s%> and sore <S%H7451><s%> troubles, <S%H6869><s%> shall quicken <S%H2421><s%> me again, <S%H7725><s%> and shall bring <S%H5927><s%> me up again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H8415><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
You shall increase <S%H7235><s%> my greatness, <S%H1420><s%> and comfort <S%H5162><s%> me on every <S%H5437><s%> side. <S%H5437><s%>

I will also <S%H1571><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> you with the psaltery, <S%H3627><s%> even your truth, <S%H571><s%> O my God: <S%H430><s%> to you will I sing <S%H2167><s%> with the harp, <S%H3658><s%> O you Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
My lips <S%H8193><s%> shall greatly rejoice <S%H7442><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> I sing <S%H2167><s%> to you; and my soul, <S%H5315><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have redeemed. <S%H6299><s%>

My tongue <S%H3956><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shall talk <S%H1897><s%> of your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long: for they are confounded, <S%H954><s%> for they are brought <S%H2659><s%> to shame, <S%H2659><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> my hurt. <S%H7451><s%>
